name: sedge stripes baby blanket
notes:
purchasable pdf pattern: https://www.etsy.com/listing/767835928/crochet-sedge-stripes-baby-blanket

free printable version of pattern (which can be saved as a pdf) available at the bottom of this page: https://daisyfarmcrafts.com/crochet-sedge-stripes-baby-blanket/

youtube video about the sedge stitch: https://www.youtube.com/watch?time_continue=4&v=aqmlhcvq5f8&feature=emb_logo

materials
* finished size 30Ã—32 inches
* 3 balls of red heart soft essentials in white
* 1 balls of red heart soft essentials in peony
* 3 balls of red heart soft essentials in greyhound
* size j, 6 mm hook
* tapestry needle
* scissors
